item.title: CS1.406 Advanced Algorithms (Spring 2022)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Dixit Kumar Garg and S Shodasakshari Vidya Schedule: Monday and Thursday, 11:30 – 12:55 Classroom: SH-2 (2nd floor, C-1 Vindhya) Problem sets Problem set 1 (Due: 12.01.2022) Lectures Introduction to Randomized algorithms, RandQS Class notes References: Chapter 1 of [Motwani-Raghavan][1], Chapter 1 & Section 2.4 of [Mitzenmacher-Upfal][2] References [1] R. Motwani and P. Raghavan (1995), Randomized Algorithms, Cambridge University Press.
